jade.misc
Class LeadershipManager

java.lang.Object
  jade.misc.LeadershipManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class LeadershipManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements jade.util.leap.Serializable

This class can be used when a group of agents need to coordinate to elect one leader. Each agent in the group is expected to use one LeadershipManager object. The leader election procedure is based on the bully algorithm

See Also:

Constructor Detail

LeadershipManager

public LeadershipManager()
Method Detail

init

public void init(jade.core.Agent a)
          throws jade.core.ServiceException
Bind this LeadershipManager to a given agent, initialize configuration properties, register to receive messages about the leader-election topic, starts the behaviour listening for such messages and initialize the upTime;

Parameters:
a - The Agent to bind to
Throws:
jade.core.ServiceException

isLeader

public boolean isLeader()

getLeader

public jade.core.AID getLeader()

updateLeadership

public void updateLeadership()
Activate the leader election procedure

setProposalResponseTimeout

public void setProposalResponseTimeout(long t)
Set the timeout used to wait for responses to an attempt to become leader

Parameters:
t - the timeout used to wait for responses to an attempt to become leader

setProposalRetryInterval

public void setProposalRetryInterval(long t)
Set the maximum interval between two successive attempts to become leader. The actual interval will be a random amount of time between 0 and this value.

Parameters:
t - the maximum interval between two successive attempts to become leader

leaderElected

protected void leaderElected(jade.core.AID leader)
This callback method is invoked whenever a new leader is elected. The default implementation is empty. Applications can override it to react to this event properly.
